Reviews.Title: “Look out for the rip off at breakfast”

Reviews.Title: “Urban rooms are nice”
Reviews.Author: flaljee
Reviews.Content: perfect hotel visits stayed several times number years recently june hotel isnt centre frankfurt close site arent many restaurants close hotel luckily bar restaurant hotel offer good food

Reviews.Title: “park plaza victoria.”
Reviews.Author: esmond357
Reviews.Content: okay hotel close ok maybe look good enough booked hotel thought would close center isnt case hotel outside city center reached easily takes 2025 minutes rooms large convenient breakfast absolutely good staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a city trip”
Reviews.Author: Philip3012
Reviews.Content: hotel overall rated 3star hotel clean comfortable friendly staff wellappointed rooms food particularly tasty plus since arent lot options area couple youre looking cool location frankfurt isnt trouble even finding place directions posted site bit dark 2 hotel noisy inside room hear horrible elevators think loud enough sleep even earplugs wee hours starts around 5 bad enough consider switching hotels first night like place hotel popular flight attendants must favorite terms price convenience

Reviews.Title: “Brillant”
Reviews.Author: nomispsp
Reviews.Content: total okay also 2 nights double incl breakfast 2 days transport one dinner welcome present 40 euros total first room got noisy caused elevator therefore asked change second room spacious well equipped tv radio player small desk breakfast great spa sauna steam bath fitness chairs okay sometimes staff little unfriendly parking 14 total great deal us

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, beautiful hotel.”
Reviews.Author: urv123
Reviews.Content: budget hotel 2 nights 70 breakfast included made order public transport ticket two days worth 14 euro hotel could need renovation room okay bathroom smallish side budget traveller fair choice staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “BRILLIANT”
Reviews.Author: NPreece
Reviews.Content: run place renovated frankfurt might comfortable place times gone place run beds terrible condition also pleasant place town sum really worth money

Reviews.Title: “Well situated for weekend break”

Reviews.Content: full

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: SC T
Reviews.Content: gerne wieder full

Reviews.Title: “Definitively not worth the money and the hassle... horrible night after food poisoning......”
Reviews.Author: Athina L
Reviews.Content: full

Reviews.Title: “horrible and poor service”
Reviews.Author: Anna A
Reviews.Content: well located well run comfortable hotel foot comes pricing basic rate bed extra 19 euro one buy breakfast booked advance however walk breakfast dry cold scrambled eggs service whatsoever even help tea coffee cost 24 euro ridiculously expensive city mcdonalds cost 1 euro big cost 3 euro number good establishments offering english breakfast within hundred meters half price

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Lucy F
Reviews.Content: known victoria hotel hotel stands right across centraal station heart amsterdam building historic building also means bit dated two rooms regular urban prefer urban rooms modern decor red dark furniture fresh feel despite smaller space contrast regular rooms larger dated furniture floor traditional look service hotel average probably always busy looking personal attention place big plus staying hotel free high speed wifi reason high speed internet room take bill checkout find odd one stays forgot take internet bill call get adjusted nice swimming pool guests use access sauna fitness center costs extra finally room service rather expensive case hotels amsterdam ordered meal cost price added room charge another service fee knew bill

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Rooms fantastic, Staff Very Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Nelly P
Reviews.Content: stayed husbands 40th birthday fabulous hotel right opposite central train safe around hotel evening lit beautifully stayed bed breakfast status food first class everything wanted food looked fresh hotel lovely spa facility used one evening pool steam room sauna etc advised hotel go get better deals trips went thoroughly enjoyed stay would recommend hotel anyone thinking going

Reviews.Title: “location location location!”
Reviews.Author: ulsterwolf545
Reviews.Content: perfect hotel short break amsterdam stayed new wing hotel spacious modern room connecting doors allowed us keep eye kids comfort available room nice bathroom course kids loved indoor swimming pool personnel attentive provides service like breakfast gave everything could think price goes choice 25 pp high end ideally located sightseeing donâ€™t mind special ambiance streets behind hotel

Reviews.Title: “Don't let them fob you off.”
Reviews.Author: Ryan B
Reviews.Content: stayed three night february place great booked paid double room executive room brilliant large room everything needed breakfast great buffet style large choise hot cold youre eggs cooked order one heat light staff helpfull perfect location looking around train across road main street heads dam square everything close trams easy use buy ticket hop please best way get around

Reviews.Title: “convenient”
Reviews.Author: Harish P
Reviews.Content: hotel great room little tired although spotless understand urban wing updated lots building works going outside bring ear plugs

Reviews.Title: “nightshift sucks”
Reviews.Author: fcb4life
Reviews.Content: first visit amsterdam found park plaza victoria trip advisor site brilliant hotel newly renovated rooms central right opposite central station noisy food excellent lunch dinner breakfast concierge service brilliant definately go back

Reviews.Title: “The Best Location/Quality Option In Central Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: PietroMorrizio
Reviews.Content: hotel situated opposite main station making ideal travellers schipol airport busy area hotel fairly quiet inside facilities good rooms comfortable could bit upgrading quite expensive food drink buzzing atmosphere looking traditional peaceful place may suit short walk main sights including red light district ok short weekend break

Reviews.Title: “Definately the best choice”
Reviews.Author: lockeys
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights really mixed last year stayed older part like earlier review corridor smelt disgusting went back year really excellent location hotel stayed urban wing time pleasant modern room cold even though radiator isnt heating bathroom even curtains long thick covered radiator told reception first night cold room told would give us heater heater arrived curtains behind radiator could get heat problem noisy could hear water running radiator told reception concierge second morning promised heater one didnt arrive left next day obviously didnt maid wasnt good either never replaced empty box left wide open bathroom took soap well disappeared took used hotel didnt replace clean ones never bedside tables needless say didnt get tip fine staff friendly helpful except trying get heater concierges great guidance directions etc location brilliant near station shops bars restaurants said would probably go location rather anything else

Reviews.Title: “agood choice i made”
Reviews.Author: pamela s Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: friend went amsterdam decided spend night hotel room comfortable looked clean bathroom still red stains walls decided evening meal hotels food extremely expensive quality taste less average horrible night food night spoken manager day sorry friendly helpful person concierge hotel also common toilets next restaurant clean public like 4star hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very central in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Danes55
Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel 3 nights first night noisy woke around 6 times night due noises got room although pointed sensitive noise promised us room less noisy area didnt get also forgot expensive new electrical toothbrush want get back emailed regarding matter called 3 times every call leads giving us different wrong email took around 10 minutes lady reception email different email first got yet received response email regarding lost property called ask lady reception simply cut said email hung poor service unhelpful staff never stay

Reviews.Title: “Breathtaking Boat Rides Just Steps From The Hotel”
Reviews.Author: bridgebysue
Reviews.Content: pretty excited spend last night holland central hotel amsterdam get really nice apologized us overbooked hotel us another nearby sister hotel asked far first said 2 blocks luckily one friends travelled many times amsterdam asked show us hotel map guy location map seems like 46 blocks upgrade us next hotel give us bottle wine asked exact address name new hotel start walking insisted us via cab convenience waited 12 hour cab got also added another group travellers us cab cab started driving driving away center city somewhere past van gogh museum beyond total ride minutes 25 circle put map got asked circle location somewhere acceptable really mean ive seen bad dutch service bad honestly never go back hotel ended reservation went back amazing four points central station

Reviews.Title: “Great location. A good value for money.”
Reviews.Author: Can C
Reviews.Content: positive thing could find hotel location front central station connects airport direct train 20 min wrong arrived around 10pm nobody entrance open door greet clerk reception advised unfortunately time help us luggage corridors rooms terribly tired buffet breakfast good one morning walking around breakfast restaurant staff trying gave started making fun situation

Reviews.Title: “Location excellent”
Reviews.Author: Cmonica
Reviews.Content: wonderful location comfortable rooms fabulous staff especially concierge asked got upgrade executive suite king size bed criticism service brasserie poor

Reviews.Title: “Good location and refurb”
Reviews.Author: aussietraveler56
Reviews.Content: 40th wife booked couple nights stay hotel arrived told fully booked could stay sister hotel upgraded suite taxi paid also gave us option coming back next day staying suite supposed taxi expense much agreed knowing something outside city taxi driver said another 1015 minutes away asked driver stop get touch hotel tell happy hotel explained wasnt good enough spent time taxi train airport reception staff seemed put offered apology even checking soon found room wasnt suite paid suite available next day moved without hesitation level room outside room smelt someone smell inside carpet hadnt next bed nice moved suite complaints none amsterdam hotel left us sour taste back taxi driver said probably sold room one busiest weekends even knew

Reviews.Title: “Good location but be aware of upfront charges”
Reviews.Author: ma_admin
Reviews.Content: hotel convenient right opposite amsterdam centraal station middle amsterdam attractions room decent though couple provided two single beds clearly mentioned 1 queen bed provided also bathroom shower bath tub havent tried food hotel bit expensive

Reviews.Title: “Great experience and friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: Rudolph2011
Reviews.Content: value ok rooms ok staff pretty rude nice rude especially guy even never stay

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: john h Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed park plaza victoria amsterdam hotel victoria two occasions would chose hotel looking great quality hotel option central amsterdam hard beat location right corner damrak right across historic centraal station train hotel right several canal tour options ten minute walk dam square madame one direction ann franks house located prinsengracht near less ten minutes walk amsterdams red light district first trip room quite nice second trip got upgrade suite book short notice missing flight berlin amsterdam day great living room stairs bedroom right top building probably best view canal amsterdam centraal money buy hotel old beautiful decor breakfast scrambled egg toast rather buffet handy hotel looking use train go either schipol airport heading town either holland france takes 20 minutes platform centraal station get schipol airport quite way amsterdam also great exit hotel right damrak seems main foot traffic amsterdam reasonably good restaurants along damrak head direction almost certainly pass part red light district real especially night hotels immediate vicinity think one lovely old hotel best terms holland kind place really pay get something good would hesitate pick hotel next go amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Stylish, great location, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Yiota K
Reviews.Content: 3rd time stayed hotel keeps getting stayed beautiful urban wing comfortable beds ever got great 3 night deal shopping included spread suit refreshing swimming pool start day staff extremely hotel mins walk central train station 5 mins red light district canal shops hand also

Reviews.Title: “close to main rail station”
Reviews.Author: JuliaPv
Reviews.Content: would recomend nice hotel people worked help full would come back

Reviews.Title: “City Centre Location a saving grace”
Reviews.Author: Neil R
Reviews.Content: arriving airport 1 floor buy train amsterdam central 5 walk later check hotel fantastic good location walk interesting points central amsterdam welcome reception stay ask rooms new part hotel bridge larger modern use 2 different elevators worth take old part rooms old rooms good numbers limited modern bed bathroom room general easy find restaurants close hotel try restaurant also good food staff also good visit modern bar good drinks beer staff good job breakfast morning ok alot option find bit euro total good hotel manager must proud staff good sure stay hotel many times past use hotel holiday business

Reviews.Title: “More Cons than pros for us, would not return.”
Reviews.Author: VivecaSingapore
Reviews.Content: directly opposite central station rail right beginning damrak main street hotels amsterdam small due nature buildings history however victoria park plaza extended next door building created urban wing smart modern rooms adequate size view beautiful central station trams make noise pass amsterdam friendly efficient staff recommend hotel cant really fault

Reviews.Title: “Lovely base for a stay in Amsterdam.”
Reviews.Author: Lizbob77
Reviews.Content: great location right accross train station meters away short walk dam square rooms looking towards main street little noisy though hotel actually spread couple building might feel like walking thru maze find room definitely good value money

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JoJo_5666 Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel years ago choose close amsterdam central pleasantly surprised find renovated looking absolutely lobby looked clean well kept check quick room urban wing lovely excellent lighting friendly disappointment small pool fitness however would highly recommend hotel anyone wanting comfortable pleasant base explore lovely city

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with nice staff but...”
Reviews.Author: UnTjus
Reviews.Content: new urban rooms look great per usual fantastic breakfast excellent location especially

Reviews.Title: “Fully recommended”
Reviews.Author: Mikeep69
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel find helpful concierge helped us luggage smile however shocked find hotel put hold credit card stay 4 nights bill asked claimed placed charges cover breakfast due far expensive never used also claimed claimed 5 nights instead 4 never offered room clean small bathroom small room essentials toiletries etc location excellent plan train trip next morning downside location endless rubbish outside nearby red light morning would find hotel staff rubbish hotel steps fire something never seen

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sian J Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: went two days london amsterdam hotel staff charming temperature pretty nice inside hotel outside cold old wing traditional europe traveled nice get nice room good view centraal station perfectly located walk board tram city great experience others hotels chain uk good great additional tip travelers via london amsterdam consider time use security check point back uk rush miss eurostar take time use exit french one middle case maybe better deal time

Reviews.Title: “Very reasonable chain hotel”

Reviews.Content: good hotel great place stay friendly staff stay amsterdam best hotel stayed would come back

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: terene b Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: overall experience excellent hotel stylish modern staff helpful conveniently located amsterdam centraal train rail station 15 minutes schipol airport also tram station location central makes easy walk around amsterdam centre rooms cleaned daily generally good condition beds relaxing would love stay would definitely reccomend people know

Reviews.Title: “Aggressive management PLS READ & poor quality rooms”

Reviews.Content: location close main rail station hotel within sight exiting rail station minutes walk lobby entry upstairs room new wing quiet spacious clean bathroom facilities clean bright buffet breakfasts excellent compared many reasonable value 13 euro would stay without hesitation

Reviews.Content: travelling amsterdam business location hotel opposite centraal station means easy get local transport types close amsterdam literally doorstep however quality hotel poor open first day arrived tv entertainment system work food restaurant poor staff appeared sorry reviews clear customer service high dissapointing

Reviews.Content: whats good location good things hotel 1 concierges fabulous hands make hotel wonderful 2 brasserie good range value money delicious food urban suite eventually given lovely whats good 1 wrong room booking via bookingcom contacted hotel direct request upgrade urban suite etc confirmed email upon arrival assigned one room told come back two hours given key cards told wrong room upgraded urban junior suite refused told originally booked twin room kindly upgraded king double twin beds king bed upgrade upon returning 2 hours assigned another taken victoria wing taken awful room immediately phoned reception insisted mistake bad first impression hotel 2 early check option arrived 10am wait full 2 hours get room 3 assigned 3 rooms total could 1 room upon arrival never saw another went back collect keys another complained wasnt room upgraded already paid reception staff reluctant move us printed email confirmed upgrade made feel awful birthday trip none careful pre arrangements carried eg birthday card treatment 3 reception staff unfriendly point avoided reception totally 4 hotel cards door didnt work several occasions accidentally checked several times system booking meaning room hadnt cleaned either 5 cleaning staff say house keeping enter room anyway even call say caught bed several occasions early privacy always listening door open 6 credit card already paid room via hotel booking group arrived told hadnt charged room deposit pay departure completely different rate contact hotel upon return home make case error refund us difference would return

Reviews.Title: “Snow outside, warm inside.”
Reviews.Author: rooboy68
Reviews.Content: arrived today happy early checking ready room small bad however 5 days business going stay entire trip cant wait leave paid high speed wifi horrible sitting dinner table near 15 hours one saying anything unacceptable service

Reviews.Title: “Center located Hotel with nice rooms, but”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel girlfriend november everything lovely thought would return friend checked last time told told put euro deposit room credit card wich didnt checked got back euros back cash told local tax full back time changed back pocket dissapointed room lovely paid hand going use mini bar etc thought way con extra money dont appreciate ripped

Reviews.Title: “TV not working”
Reviews.Author: shah28
Reviews.Content: stay park plaza victoria hotel february 2012 got room old part hotel renovated outside hotel room small space around bed could get bed one side end bed bed small bathroom almost bigger rest room bathroom nice bathtub nice noise streets wich might windows found bed small asked staff different room wich gave us next day trouble even luggage us new part hotel room bigger newly renovated new room nice great bed bigger cosy brand new bathroom without bathtub huge shower short period free internet otherwise must pay breakfast charge 24 euro breakfast wich bit much choose breakfast order eggs freshly cooked nice stay thanks friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable & accessible”
Reviews.Author: TopsMA
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights friday saturday totally happy room booked comparison site knew good deal reached expectations arrived early way check around 1130 pleasantly surprised told room ready kindly gave us upgrade without asking thank although book 3 4 weeks earlier male receptionist polite helpful welcoming room executive double lovely clean well furnished everything expect 4 star hotel except bath robes tv already welcome message enough english channels wish watch tv provided nice range toiletries small unusual extra touch despite front quiet light noise heard outside hotel ideally located 5 minute less walk central station outside currently work done look good inside paid per night 2 nights good value money although breakfast included expensive 20 euros overall lovely stay would certainly return good deal available park plaza victoria amsterdam fully recommended

Reviews.Title: “Spot on!”
Reviews.Author: Jo R
Reviews.Content: well maintained hotel excellent facilities conveniently situated opposite central station within easy walking distance amsterdams main attractions careful order breakfast though per head although tasty plenty breakfast expensive

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: SophieJayy
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights 2 teenagers adjoining rooms urban wing rooms spacious use wall bed comfortable staff helpful friendly surprised read recent negative reviews experience room cleaned late day location ideal sightseeing well known landmarks within walking distance save museumplein easy tram ride outside hotel eat hotel save ice cream lounge noticed brasserie served breakfasts reasonably cheap prices hotel restaurant breakfast prices car parking service excellent car taken away outside hotel returned appointed time two firstly arriving late day went chinese restaurant recommended booked us table bland meal dull restaurant discovered next day hundred yards number interesting highly reviewed restaurants secondly swimming pool hotel asset travelling teenagers one reasons chose hotel pool fine extra charge per person 10 euros use every time sauna steam room highly expensive extra view great pity

Reviews.Content: ive amsterdam several times hotel definitely best ive stayed rooms lovely clean quiet spacious big soft comfy beds shower hot room included lots nice little extras none amsterdam hotels ive used previously provided toiletries shampoo soap etc free teacoffee making facilities iron tv english channels ie bbc1 2 location hotel pretty central things although easy enough get taxi legs getting weary hotel probably per night expensive hotels ive used extra well worth every penny

Reviews.Content: picked hotel central transport links 5 day conference professional people travel many hotels ams pretty much every month however would never stay checked given room key next 5 days room strong stale cigarettes rang reception changed room urban suite suite dark difficult get ready several lifts stairs away exit hotel kettle disgusting really think someone housekeeping changed kettle agreed bad smell room cleaned entire time stayed sure missed us days ring reception fresh towels milk etc day 3 still cleaning stay front desk staff nice helpful upon check told manager wanted speak us b actually manager part time security claimed left floor maybe smoked room mess wanted charge us additional cleaning maybe full room never cleaned wife lived words nasty way felt approach wife shocked attitude lack class could charge nothing completely refused nothing nothing moved one smoked fact room fine apart looked like someone stayed 5 days without cleaner ruined time away made us feel threatened confused unhappy spending nearly park plaza victoria well done

Reviews.Title: “Great location - Historic building”
Reviews.Author: Passed50
Reviews.Content: location excellent shame room though dark web shown booked superior room definitely loved amsterdam recommend de wonderful lovely home made foods recommend especially ham train service excellent schipol 15 mins central station

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: TessBless
Reviews.Content: arrived 3 day business trip second stay hotel experiences good staff friendly efficient helpful hotel good quality bistro type restaurant nice food separate bar area internet room large waiting area away front desk hotel 300 bedrooms one spacious well appointed clean comfortable 3 easy chairs work area high speed day free wifi casual room 32 tv multiple channels including uk bbc breakfast well presented buffet style large choice suit needs cab rank outside front main subway train station 100 yards away noise heard room water taxis 50 yards away tram station distance good hotel central area close amenities attractions would stay taxis quite expensive drivers seem know long routes contrast tram costs central station along damrak heineken brewery journey visiting amsterdam first time train runs schipol airport every 15 minutes takes 20 25 mins costs around well worth day hop hop bus tour worth experience canals could seen times day night hope enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam for the New Year Celebrations”
Reviews.Author: figsteruk1
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed 5 days amsterdam hotel concierge fantastic organising restaurant bookings things strangely though three mornings five asked waiter fried eggs ham two occasions got instead nothing really complain delicious maybe communication issue urban room great take advantage upgrade check offered take train schiphol hotel right across road station

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: stayed park plaza amsterdam end january asked quiet room pleased find self room disturbing noises great breakfast special offered 19 euro ok nothing compare order spot chef make order breakfast extended version british breakfast start day says factor missing biggest issue hotel dirty carpets hallway floors somehow dirty carpets mind time staying place

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Location for the Train Station!”
Reviews.Author: BES59
Reviews.Content: tv working room front desk cant anything much

Reviews.Title: “Victoria Hotel, Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: JTFomes
Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel great location opposite station despite reviews staff seemed pleasant helpful ate restaurant alone one evening staff attentive bar staff also although busy courteous efficient room comfortable quiet plenty space complaint given quality hotel generally bath towels small fluffy

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Location”
Reviews.Author: Pudsey126
Reviews.Content: surprised read poor reviews regarding staff victoria plaza arrived back yesterday 4 night stay found amongst courteous helpful hotel staff weve encountered anywhere ever sign lobby toilet asking non guests clearly allowed use pay privilege saw several hotels use hotel guests one night man followed us lobby asked us staff surrounded quickly lobby staff went great offer advice tours trips etc however buy canal boat tickets hotel claimed discounted rate one couple party found cheaper per person turn dock staff member question nice didnt couple euros hotel two classic urban given classic room quite large clean etc upgraded suite urban side modern stylish separate sitting room extra tv expresso coffee maker 7 foot bed memory foam matress lovely bottle water complimentary drank appeared mini bar bill end stay watch hotel perfectly situated reviewers already mentioned took train schipol airport 3 stops exiting station hotel directly opposite 2 minute suitcase drag breakfast one morning seasons restaurant good little pricey side plenty places nearby eat staff happily mind luggage departure day youre leaving amsterdam check time would stay hotel well run efficient experience staff positive theyre giving things away

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, rooms and service”
Reviews.Author: illusio
Reviews.Content: went amsterdam 21st excellent time alot people put going couldnt asked nicer weekend hotel great staff friendly booked standard room upgraded got executive room birthday kindly offered suite price executive room fine us especially balcony best hotel amsterdam location opposite central station walk hotel could go left coffee shops right main strip red light district hotel quite pricey food well worth food delicious enquired best place go man stand reception recommended place called went looked quite shabby one nicest id ever great weekend returning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Some upgrading needed”
Reviews.Author: Jbps
Reviews.Content: either lucky park deliver visit good location clean rooms polite nice staff professional well managed whole big hall full guests checking organized trips leaving day running marathon smoothly smile issue reception spare mobile phone would expect hotel standard covered

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service!!!”
Reviews.Author: KERF_Worldwide
Reviews.Content: great room urban great bar bar next hotel owned hotel probably 1 cheapest places drink amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice service and room”
Reviews.Author: keenscarlet
Reviews.Content: tell hotel historic old decorations tight corridors also modern section room clean spacious helpful staff problems recommending hotel location right next central station main tram lines practical

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for short stopovers”
Reviews.Author: smile81
Reviews.Content: hotel situated across road main train station short cheap train journey schipol airport location second none rooms high standard food company dinner hotel good breakfast offered great selection slight let leisure centre small pool gym plus sauna jacuzzi much fun leisure travellers

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for an Amsterdam weekend”
Reviews.Author: CostinN
Reviews.Content: like hotel convenience central train station hop high speed train airport hotel room within half hour exactly wanted reception staff brilliant couldnt helpful cafe nice good spot bit people watching although come straight train another nice touch complimentary bottled water room

Reviews.Title: “The perfect place to stay at.”
Reviews.Author: Georgeemadarmanious
Reviews.Content: hotel staff extremely helpful friendly excellent location short walk station close many attractions upstairs room new wing quiet spacious clean bathroom facilities clean bright wifi connection free guests breakfast also excellent expensive poor air conditioning

Reviews.Title: “Great Brasserie, quirky room”

Reviews.Content: husband travels amsterdam every month hotel going stop refurbished beautiful decor reception friendly everyone helpful room nice large room amsterdam quite looking back street shopping street drinks dinner cafe right street friendly staff great soup nice cold beer look forward many stays hotel coming years

Reviews.Title: “Nice room, prime location”
Reviews.Author: ChuckandNeil
Reviews.Content: really great 5mins walk centraal station centre canal rides red light area 200 yards never know loads great serves good beer great food rooms clean staff go

Reviews.Title: “another one bites the dust”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights february half children stones throw away central station found easy travel walk tourist sites like anne franks house van gogh museum taking back routes along canals room comfortable family room picked breakfast various street cafes route destination day staff friendly efficient would definitely stay added bonus next time would free internet access

Reviews.Title: “One night in Amsterdam”

Reviews.Content: stayed one night december impressed hotel 1 minute walk central train station reception concierge staff extremely helpful room excellent would happily return

Reviews.Title: “Do not go...”

Reviews.Content: hotel directly opposite central station great location transport links hotel spotlessly clean friendly attentive knowledgeable staff bedrooms extremely comfortable spacious excellent towels toiletries plenty hot water morning excellent breakfast buffet pleasing see hotel breakfast hours weekends leisure guests unfortunately hot buffet items hot three mornings stayed hotel disappointment staff dishes effort heat work would stay yes convenience friendliness staff comfort hotel general

Reviews.Content: wonderful experience park plaza victoria pleasant helpful room urban wing amazed clean spacious bed roomy bathroom also spacious clean didnt use mini bar expensive didnt time use pool facilities stayed 1 night breakfast another surprise buffet style everything could want dont get typical hot breakfast scrambled sausages available good choice drinks highly recommended want top class hotel

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, if a little bland”

Reviews.Content: like others said hilton dont expect hilton paid room comfortable three adult sisters room roomy clean breakfast great staff nice location great free wifi although slow upgrade want pay lcd tv great channels concierge really service got worth

Reviews.Content: amsterdam business hotel group discounted rate ive stayed park cities countries problem picking venue finding hotel amsterdam central station easy directly opposite work going nothing lobby well appointed friendly reception staff two concierges right ready assist need pair stay eye leave main lobby area go floors started seem bit dated long walk room room modern fresh well kept good tv channel selection certain movies seemed package save walk streets red light district outside round corner damrak plenty restaurants shopping nearby obviously red light district road breakfasts excellent massive choice well laid problem getting comfortable seating id would definitely consider another visit amsterdam get corridor lighting carpet upgraded

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel sept 2011 great location right across canal short walk hotel central train station great help front desk great help blocks sites see amsterdam walked everywhere hotel upgraded urban room way cool modern clean lcd tv ultra modern bathroom fixtures charge internet although less speed charge cant complain especially europe

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely brilliant!!!”

Reviews.Content: would definitely visit stayed spring 2011 clean compared anywhere else stayed quiet although ask room back hotel liked ease access airport via train station across road

Reviews.Title: “Great location, showing it's age.”

Reviews.Content: hotel rather extraordinary reviews recently see eg review 16 august say straight away kind room old part hotel true old somewhat smell room modern furnished reasonably spacious superior double generally comfortable excellent inroom facilities keyboard room giving access internet via large flat screen tv checkin process efficient quick front desk staff friendly helpful checkout equally speedy hotel ideally located right opposite amsterdam centraal railway station main tourist attractions easily within walking distance however one would expect pay premium rate central location major european city rate superior double night booked via lastminutecom full advance still quite extortionate

Reviews.Content: hotel old havent done good job said location absolutely excellent tvs old english options beds old kind feeling food hotel acceptable nothing service okay nothing write home didnt use internet im sure rooms good size though

Reviews.Content: stayed many times past got worse every time front desk staff rude rooms ready time hotel management respond feedback accompanied pictures show dirt wear tear rooms upgraded hotel park plaza reputation

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful hotel, great staff”
Reviews.Author: KatNYC1
Reviews.Content: stones throw central station nice hotel recently updated like renovated park beds comfortable rooms neat tidy shower big powerful essential good nights sleep room selection good toiletries dont need worry taking airport youre carrying hand luggage hotel walking distance amsterdams main sights dutch tram railway system means taking train office wherever amsterdam much cheaper taxi often quicker due traffic tasty simple meal brasserie reasonably priced hotel food ive stayed think tulip hotel later nh hotel group improved already good little pricey though choose go theres similar amsterdam even though hotel far full think must block reserve rooms might worth booking late ask quiet room room view view plaza front central station took view rooms recently renovated like watch city action warned woken trams early morning

Reviews.Title: “Extreamly pleased”
Reviews.Author: jhe75
Reviews.Content: hotel best location main sights amsterdam right opposite centraal station everything accessible easy room clean comfortable best thing experience helpful friendly staff look breakfast service wonderful concierge team peter answer question city give advice help make stay stay staff really seem want help take pleasure

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: CK2009
Reviews.Content: took train paris amsterdam 5 upon arriving central station thrilled find hotel literally across road made way hotel first impressions nice lobby area busy looks modern cocktail lounge huge line check staff quick waiting 10 mins max good location staff makes hotel close red light district cafes shopping malls attractions staff make feel comfortable welcoming bed room big comfy machine room coffee bonus room service food yummy much choice menu buffet breakfast hand great choices food wi fi free high speed extra pay daily rate bad pre paid executive room expedia night shocked got room get room go another set doors staircase area strange thought executive meant nicer average rooms turn airconditioning room extremely loud sound plane take construction going right outside window non stop banging going perhaps hotel provide rooms construction going least advise us bathrobes slippers 4 star hotel towels tiny im 5 foot 2 small liking fiance 6 foot 1 could barely wrap towels ugly smell coming staircase right outside room view construction going partner celebrating didnt want complain much knew would trip tomorrow hotel much better sum location staff good would stay price paid probably also think hotel new section old section unfortunately us got put old section top room outside staircase old section love amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location - lovely staff and good rooms”
Reviews.Author: neds0
Reviews.Content: stayed one year anniversary upon arrival reception also upgraded receptionist one newly refurbished urban wing rooms great beds comfortable one mattress rather usual two pushed together well view looking central station top floor problems noise air conditioning worked aswell 26 degrees stay good breakfast included rate great good choice especially cappucino tea hot warm like experienced hotels location fantastic would definitely stay recommend travellers

Reviews.Title: “Wow ....... Dream come True !”
Reviews.Author: goldielock08
Reviews.Content: stayed group friends weekend location simply perfect exploring amsterdam hotel nice airy lovely hotel buzzing staff still smiling attentive birthday different requests met attitude nice decorated room spacious towards atrium quiet us got newly refurbished modern rooms equally pleased big proper double bed two annoying mattresses sliding apart night many hotels slept like log spacious airy breakfast room good breakfast good cheeses fresh fruit good coffee simply nice week end nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Central location, clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: StevieLip
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights august pleased impressed room urban wing led believe modern spacious comfortable clean room cleaned day excellent job bathroom fantastic shower well special mention concierge service used couple times always helpful knowledgeable â€“ recommended good dutch restaurant one evening booked table hard rock cafe one evenings helped tram catch looked luggage final day need help â€“ ask reviews say hotel incredibly central convenient attractions amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel, excellent location”
Reviews.Author: dimapsi
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel june quality room think thereâ€™s rolling refurbishment rooms really nice others bit old room newly decorated felt calm relaxing large shower clean bathroom went comfortable bed bit hard find room different way get hotel busy sometimes queue reception staff helpful central station side square itâ€™s easy get airport ticket attractions mainly station damrak hotel well placed good restaurant ground floor used breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel and excellent location in most respects”
Reviews.Author: stevehutch
Reviews.Content: newly renovated wing bridge better rooms although shaped ones old wing facilities work well nice flatscreen tv good showers plenty space work necessary lighting bathrooms could improved number tv channels otherwise place works well location ideal staff helpful across board reception concierge room service breakfast team dont work hotel stay lot business complaints apart tram tourist noise outside cannot given location

Reviews.Title: “Convenient but not the best”
Reviews.Author: JudithChalmers09
Reviews.Content: hotel tired oldfashioned though looks great outside lobby tiny inconvenient big bags dark old carpets room executive category thing good coffe machine rest tired old cheap bathroom tiny simple say cheap breakfast mediocre nothing eat dining hall cold never stay visit amsterdam quite hard imagine city return

Reviews.Title: “If you love trains and trams, this is the hotel for you!”
Reviews.Author: GordonChicago
Reviews.Content: check wed walked rain check quite rude needing passport great first impression apart basically expected standard hotel fantastic location cant well placed taxi rank right outside surrounded places eat ended heading quite far south city dinner get tourist trap little bit add called ironing board arrived within 5 minutes impressive overall service bit overall bad hotel one night stay

Reviews.Title: “Treated very badly , bullied & robbed by security after they woke us at 2am”
Reviews.Author: Arsenal2223
Reviews.Content: spent 5 nights victoria hotel earlier month august 2011 enjoyed stay much staff helpful advised us daily different attractions amsterdam provided us several discounts line tickets saved us money time rooms new wing spacious nice view attached central station area 7th floor rooms noise inside rooms free wifi service speed enough make calls via anyway upgrade high speed internet breakfast delight every morning could skip even morning left

Reviews.Title: “Showing its age”
Reviews.Author: Papoofnik
Reviews.Content: spent week park plaza victoria amsterdam hotel convenient location traveling sight seeing city center hotel beautiful grand entrance lobby restaurant one best amsterdam breakfast buffet amazing rooms good size clean pretty quiet staff exceptionally friendly hospitable professional back

Reviews.Title: “A great place to celebrate a 40th Birthday”
Reviews.Author: LeaHB333
Reviews.Content: great location service rooms downside big hotel discovered one room saw several foyer problem inner city hotel seemed nice front desk room reported however returning

Reviews.Title: “so-so hotel”
Reviews.Author: pfisher9316
Reviews.Content: great location good breakfast good rooms bad charge extra 65 eur leaving dont understand

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, well positioned”
Reviews.Author: Mike1811027
Reviews.Content: friend stayed park plaza victoria amsterdam one night european vacation location across canal train station makes traveling rail much easier train tofrom airport also located across canal rooms spacious excellent value able discounted rate concierge helpful tickets various attractions available purchase long lines various museums ive stayed numerous hotels amsterdam including hilton park plaza certainly provides good value par others

Reviews.Title: “Far too expensive”
Reviews.Author: TravelTulip2
Reviews.Content: moment cab river boat greeted helpful staff front desk concierge quick assist us checking holding luggage room ready location hotel exception right across train station pool rooms cleanliness breakfast plentiful delicious site restaurant exceptional taste service variety chose eat 2 meals

Reviews.Title: “We loved it ! Best Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: keroppisonson
Reviews.Content: love hotel looks grand across road train station usually stop get good deal otherwise expensive rooms good many dont windows hey amsterdam time room lovely complimentary wash products clean rooms really comfortable beds cross main road red light district love stopped hotel 4 times always first choice coming amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Recommended, good location, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: MatildaExeter_Uk
Reviews.Content: front 150 meters central station natural choice us stay victoria arriving train large family luggage short walking distance king people front desk modern look bedrooms clean bathrooms good quality products breakfast forgot safe found quickly sent got problems staying walking distance almost museums city thought little overpriced

Reviews.Title: “Competent, centrally located and excellent service - but...”
Reviews.Author: newmikey
Reviews.Content: visited amsterdam june 2011 4 days needed attend conference 2 days conference centre needed close tram possible also wanted close city centre sightseeing decided stay near centraal station suited us trip ever come back amsterdam wed rather stay different area museumplein see hotel directly opposite station walk found difficult choose hotel break found expensive poor review time 55 months needed decent rest emailed hotel twice advance days earlier telling would arriving early morning would really appreciate quiet room ready every hotel said would try however didnt room us arrival firstly said come back midday 1 2 eventually gave us tiny noisy room complaint 2 hours later changed nice large enough quiet room point seriously exhausted angry room comfortable clean serious need good enough bathroom tiny nice found quite hard find somewhere decent eat area ended dinner twice hotel far best meals break 3 course set menu around 30 euros per person cute bakery alleyway behind hotel buy cake coffee pancake breakfast small shop main street 3 min walk hotel buy water soaps essentials pay 22 euros buffet breakfast discovered last day breakfast options nice enough amount 10 euros discovered staff restaurant also nice helpful overall hotel job complaints except problems arrival ever need near centraal probably stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience!”
Reviews.Author: jjmod
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights end june centrally located opposite main entrance train station room good size clean good sized bathroom plenty towels although situated busy area never disturbed noise reception staff friendly concierge happy help tourist information internet available free charge lobby nice bar restaurant ate drank outside loads bars restaurants within walking distance hotel would definately stay going amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Classic Hotel in heart of the city”
Reviews.Author: DPatel20
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 days say every thing great hotel nice clean good location clean rooms comfortable nice quite big stayed urban wing staff nice helpfull 3 forgot names sorry nice great also girls reception thanks much son enjoyed stay hotel love come back recommend hotel anyone

Reviews.Title: “Beauty”
Reviews.Author: NEILPATEL1978
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights celebrate 40th wedding anniversary hospitality staff exceptional meal chef cooked us superb would recommend hotel anyone clean spacious rooms right heart dam square within easy walking main tourist attractions thanks hotel making trip special especially fab time really enjoyed 40th anniversary

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice staff and history in the walls”
Reviews.Author: cbpils
Reviews.Content: stayed april 2010 loved stay wonderful hotel great location breakfast buffet one maids brand new bottle spent days amsterdam heading dad didnt realize got

Reviews.Title: “Had a great vacation at the Park Plaza”
Reviews.Author: bigsky7
Reviews.Content: stayed last week first trip amsterdam room large felt bit dated dont think one recently remodeled rooms bathroom bit tired room first floor facing centraal station convenient bit noisy although thats hotels fault price right think great location didnt check amenities cant comment breakfast buffet good pricey

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel - Reasonable Location”
Reviews.Author: texanscot99
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights room one smallest room stayed ever life hotels bathroom nice wow reception staff nice breakfast good area one dissapointment fitness room cost money guests

Reviews.Title: “Just excellent customer service”
Reviews.Author: PerditaFall
Reviews.Content: conveniently located opposite central station within walking distance touristy things see professional disinterested staff nice room comfortable bed good bathroom teacoffee maker room problem bill quickly solved went breakfast since found breakfast buffet overpriced lots places area eat reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location, great value”
Reviews.Author: CamLovesSun
Reviews.Content: stayed park plaza victoria amsterdam third time great stayed new renovated room modern comfortable room forget quiet room great detail bathroom heated mirror ideal getting shower want hear comfy bed great view central station service great friendly helpfull way hotel awesome would definitly stay

Reviews.Title: “a terrific job”
Reviews.Author: the_dutch_hans
Reviews.Content: stayed park plaza 3 times wouldnt stay else amsterdam location best fantastic hotel manager always remembered name idea find impressive like said hotel amsterdam would even compare many thanks park plaza
